definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

sentences.english: And a plain vast and bare in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 化成面前的广漠的平原。

sentences.english: In this weather the cliff face was a foggy drop into infinity .
sentences.chinese: 在这种天气条件下，雾蒙蒙的悬崖隐入广漠无限之中。

sentences.english: Broad belts of the virgin wilderness not only reached the shores of the first river, but they even crossed it.
sentences.chinese: 广漠辽阔的处女地不仅伸展到河两岸，甚至越过它。

sentences.english: The horizon of life is widened chiefly by the enlargement of theheworks of art.
sentences.chinese: 生活的视野主要是随着心胸的广漠而变得宽广的。

sentences.english: My soul flits away into the virgin forests and to the savannas.
sentences.chinese: 我的灵魂飞向森林中的处女地和广漠的平原。

sentences.english: In the middle of this vast wasteland was a bent-over old man.
sentences.chinese: 只见广漠的荒地中央一位老人正在弯腰播种。

sentences.english: The great vault brightened, like the dome of an immense lamp.
sentences.chinese: 那广漠的天穹变得雪亮，犹如一盏巨灯的圆顶。

definition: to stretch as far as the eye can see (idiom)
